rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Alright, about this mission...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Before that, there are two things I need to discuss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0004
rows.name: First.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Following that matter, around the Pathfinders,
it seems a raid was conducted[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Just as we thought, it seems data picked up by FrontierNet
showed signs of tampering.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0007
rows.name: You mean[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0008
rows.name: In other words, the culprit is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
It means there's a Growth spy
within BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0010
rows.name: But, Vandham[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0011
rows.name: —Damn... it's utterly pathetic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Being completely deceived and exposing you guys
to life-threatening danger, myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Let me take this opportunity to apologize.
I'm truly sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0014
rows.name: That's the second point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0015
rows.name: Meh meh meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Scary Vandham-san
 is apologizing... That's weird-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hey! Quiet down!
I'll cover you in soy sauce and make a teriyaki of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0019
rows.name:
But Tatsu has a point, you know.
This isn't like you, Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0020
rows.name: Besides, we're not looking for an apology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0021
rows.name: You think so too, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs10040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Wave your hand, saying an apology isn't needed.

rows.label: xs10040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs10040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Press him and demand an apology.

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0022
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's like you both said.
We made it back safely, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Besides, if you're like that, Commander,
it'll throw everyone off their game![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0025
rows.name:
See?
Come on, let's snap out of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0026
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0027
rows.name:
But we still made it back
safely, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0028
rows.name: Though it might have just been luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Either way, we don't need you to apologize.
What we need you to do right now is lead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0030
rows.name: So, let's snap out of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0031
rows.name:
Well, if you lot say so,
I can't argue with that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Alright, I get it.
Let's move on to the mission briefing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0033
rows.name:
What I want to ask you lot this time
is to repair a malfunctioning Data Probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Location is the northern part of the White Woods.
I'll send the coordinates later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Roger that!
If it's repairs, I'm good at that, so leave it to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0036
rows.name: Yeah, counting on ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0037
rows.name:
However, the Growth's recent movements...
They've been strangely quiet, which is a concern.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0038
rows.name: Yes, I've been thinking the same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0039
rows.name:
What the so-called Lars people were saying,
about the land covered in pitch-black rock strata where lava flows[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0040
rows.name:
It's probably the place we call
the Black Steel Continent[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0041
rows.name: here's almost certainly no mistake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0042
rows.name: Though we don't know if it's true or not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0043
rows.name:
If the Growth stronghold really is there,
we can't afford to hesitate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0044
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0045
rows.name: We'll do our best, for Lao-san's sake too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0046
rows.name: Yeah, I'm countin' on ya. Please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0047
rows.name:
The countdown's getting low...
Where the hell is it?[ST:wait ]
